member.name: M:GardeningSystem.IoC.Init
member.summary: Registers all types to a internal containerbuilder. Does not build the cointainer yet.

member.name: M:GardeningSystem.IoC.RegisterToContainerBuilder(Autofac.ContainerBuilder@)
member.summary: Also needed to register all types to an external container builder. Used in GardeningSystem.RestAPI -> Startup

member.name: F:GardeningSystem.TimedHostedService._waitTillDoWorkHasFinished
member.summary: true, if the timer should wait till all work in the doWorkHandler has been done to start the new period
